sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ArchiveDiagnostics</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ArchiveDiagnostics</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ArchiveDiagnostics = Class.create();

ArchiveDiagnostics.prototype = {
  initialize : function() {
  },

  getRuleCount: function() {
	 var xx = new GlideAggregate('sys_archive');
	 xx.addAggregate('COUNT');
	 xx.addQuery('active', true);
	 xx.query();
	 xx.next();
	 return xx.getAggregate('COUNT');
  },

  getLastRun: function() {
	 var xx = new GlideRecord('sys_status');
	 xx.addQuery('name', 'glide.db.archiver');
	 xx.query();
	 if (xx.next() && xx.value.startsWith('active'))
		return 'Running';
	 
	 var xx = new GlideAggregate('sys_archive');
	 xx.addAggregate('MAX', 'last_run_date');
	 xx.setGroup(false);
	 xx.query();
	 xx.next();
	 return new GlideDateTime(xx.getAggregate('MAX', 'last_run_date')).getDisplayValue();
  },

  getTotalRecords: function() {
	 var xx = new GlideAggregate('sys_archive');
	 xx.addAggregate('SUM', 'total');
	 xx.setGroup(false);
	 xx.query();
	 xx.next();
	 return xx.getAggregate('SUM', 'total');
  },
   
  getActiveRecords: function() {
	 var xx = new GlideRecord('sys_archive');
	 xx.addQuery('active', true);
	 xx.query();
	 return xx;
  },

  type: "ArchiveDiagnostics"
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>don goodliffe</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2012-04-30 21:57:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>52689edc9f3120007aaa207c7f4bcca8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ArchiveDiagnostics</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Data Archiving" source="com.glide.auxdb">e90149cb6d2620100acb70b3534330a7</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_52689edc9f3120007aaa207c7f4bcca8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>don goodliffe</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2012-04-30 23:23:21</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>1172</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
